name: Nirav Patel
tagline: A Little UI Dev. & CF Dude
body: ### Professional Experience *** * Having around 4.5 years experience in web application development (HTML / Javascript / jQuery / Coldfusion) * Worked with Soft Corner, Ahmedabad. as Software Trainee for 4 Months during Final Semester Project in B.E. Computer Engineering. * Worked with Soft Corner, Ahmedabad. as Software Developer for 9 months – June-2008 to April-2009 (Asp.Net). * Working with iSummation Technologies Pvt. Ltd. Ahmedabad as Software Developer 3 years – April-2009 to May-2012 (UI Developer / Adobe ColdFusion). * Currently working with TechMahindra, Pune as Software Developer since June 2012 (UI Developer / Adobe ColdFusion) ### Skills *** Standards Based Front-end Web Development – AJAX – Cross Browser Compatibility – User Interface Design – Responsive Web Design – Web Application Development with ColdFusion Languages: XHTML/HTML5, CSS2/CSS3, Javascript, JSON, ColdFusion9/10 Frameworks: jQuery, Twitter Bootstrap, ColdBox (beginner level) Tools: Eclips, Dereamweaver, Notepad++, Paint.NET ### Education *** ##### B.E. Computer - Hemchandracharya North Gujarat University May-2008, 66.65% ### Contact *** Nirav Patel Email: nd_ce06@yahoo.co.in Twitter: @nd_ce About Me: http://about.me/nd_ce06 Blog: http://cfthought.blogspot.in
